opening_theme: #1: "Kimi ga Suki da to Sakebitai" by BAAD (eps 1-61)
ending_theme: #1: "Anata Dake Mitsumete'ru (あなただけ見つめてる)" by Ooguro Maki (eps 1-24)
#2: "Sekai ga Owaru Made Wa (世界が終るまでは...)" by WANDS (eps 25-49)
#3: "Kirameku Toki ni Torawarete (煌めく瞬間に捕らわれて)" by MANISH (eps 50-81)
#4: "My Friend (マイフレンド)" by Zard (eps 82-101)
